title: Sometimes I sit at my desk..
body: And wonder why Hecarim hasn't been gutted yet.

replies.body: i'm still amazed at how irelia hasn't been nerfed for like 2 or 3 years but ah well.
Yeah nearly 3 years! Honestly don't feel like she needs it :/ Only good Irelia players make Irelia seem op lo

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yOJAgQPP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-03-04T23:55:55.876+0000)
>
> Yeah nearly 3 years! Honestly don't feel like she needs it :/ Only good Irelia players make Irelia seem op lo

idk man I think that it would only be fair considering how much they have nerfed other champions and they seem to have just dodged her entirely.

like really? do they just play favourites now and not nerf a certain champ?
because honoustly there were a lot of other champions that got nerfed needlessly

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yOJAgQPP,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-04T13:32:11.291+0000)
>
> And wonder why Hecarim hasn't been gutted yet.

I don't understand how he is so sleeper, every time you get that one hecarim main he comes running down your lane at 800ms with several hundred AD, does half your health with E, then R's you, then you're dead before you even get unfeared.

Then he's at the other lanes 2 seconds later doing the same damn thing.
